title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: U.S. President Donald Trump says he'll meet Chinese Vice Premier Liu He at the White House on Friday, a signal the two sides could finally reach a truce in their trade war.Taking to Twitter on Thursday, Trump said China wants to make a deal.His latest comments come as the Chinese Vice Premier began a round of face-to-face negotiations with U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin.Watchers say a breakthrough this week could potentially lead to a summit between Presidents Trump and Xi.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
